name: musica Juju charm
description:
Musica is a web application for browsing and streaming a music library

Musica is a web application for browsing and streaming a music
library, except that you own the filesystem serving the content.
Musica includes an embeded mp3 player and is driven entirely
by the filesystem (no database required).
license:
## Overview

Musica is a web application for browsing and listening to your music. Songs are organized hierarchically in folders of Artists, and sub-folders of Albums. The PHP script presents an interface for navigating among artists and albums. It dynamically generates playlists, allows for downloading single songs, entire albums, and links to Wikipedia articles on artists and albums.

# Usage

    juju deploy musica
    juju expose musica

After a successful deployment, you can get the musica unit IP address with:

    juju status musica

and then browse to http://ip-address/musica to configure the service.

It dynamically generates playlists, allows for downloading single songs, entire albums, and links to Wikipedia articles on artists and albums.

After a successful deployment, you can get the musica unit IP address with:
